lead_paragraph: The Nets completed a deal yesterday to bring the free-agent power forward Cliff Robinson back to New Jersey, according to his agent, Bradley Marshall. The deal, which is expected to be made official today, is for two years, with the Nets holding an option for the second season. Robinson will be paid a guaranteed $2.1 million.
